title: A Maze of Twisty Little Cubicles

Instructions: Press 'R' to reset the puzzle. Press 'A' to run automatically the code or to stop it. Press 'ENTER' to run each line manually.
Use 'P' to increase the frameRate by 5 (max 60) and 'M' to reduce it (min 5). The default is 10.
Use the buttons in the top right to switch the input.
Algorithm: The input code is analyzed and some instructions patterns are replaced by new instructions: add or sub.
This allows to reduce the number of iterations required to solve the puzzle.
Display: On the left is the code provided as input. On the right is the modified code, if there is any.
